attributes.action: Please do not give the Olympic Stadium to Football !
attributes.additional_details:
Surely we can do better than giving the fantastic Olympic Stadium to Football there is too much money involved in football if the respective clubs want a new ground well go and build it! The Olympic Stadium should be used as a national athletics stadium for major event and competition and as acadamy for up coming talent to build a lasting sustainable legacy of a fantasic summer of London 2012 Olympics & Paralympics....

Please lets not sell out to Football...
